text: Syria competed at the 2000 Summer Olympics in Sydney, Australia. ==Athletics== ;Men ;Field events {|class=wikitable style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Qualification !colspan="2"|Final |- style="font-size:95%" !Result !Position !Result !Position |-align=center |align=left|Zid Abou Hamed |align=left rowspan=2|400 m hurdles |50.74 |33 |colspan=2|Did not advance |-align=center |align=left|Zahr-Edin Al Najem |52.7 |59 |colspan=2|Did not advance |} ;Women ;Combined events – Heptathlon {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Athlete !Event ! ! ! ! 200 m ! ! ! 800 m !Final !Rank |-align=center |align=left rowspan=2|Ghada Shouaa !style="font-size:95%"|Result | |— |— |— |— |— |— |rowspan=2 colspan=2| |- align=center !style="font-size:95%"|Points |0 |— |— |— |— |— |— |} ==Boxing== ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !Round of 16 !Quarterfinals !Semifinals !colspan=2|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Yousif Massas |align=left|Light middleweight | L RSC | colspan=4 |Did not advance |-align=center |align=left|Ihab Al-Youssef |align=left|Light heavyweight | L 12-9 | colspan=4 |Did not advance |} ==Shooting == Syria has qualified a single shooter. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan=2|Qualification !colspan=2|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Points !Rank !Points !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Mohamad Mahfoud |align=left|50 m rifle prone |575 |53 |colspan=2|Did not advance |} ==Swimming== Syrian swimmers earned qualifying standards in the following events (up to a maximum of 2 swimmers in each event at the A-standard time, and 1 at the B-standard time): ;Men {|class=wikitable style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Fadi Kouzmah |align=left|200 m butterfly |02:11.56 |46 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Women {|class=wikitable style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Marella Mamoun |align=left|200 m freestyle |02:18.78 |39 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ==References== *Wallechinsky, David (2004).
